OCD.name: Migration - Configuration
OCD.description: OSGi Service - Configuration to support migration process.

AD.name: Content Source File Path (in DAM)
AD.description: Path of the file having the content extract from source CMS.

AD.name: AEM Component Name and Properties
AD.description: A mapping of AEM components and associated properties(comma separated).

AD.name: Source CMS Component Name and Properties
AD.description: A mapping of source CMS components and associated properties(comma separated).

AD.name: AEM Object and JCR Property mapping
AD.description: AEM Object and JCR Property mapping. List of properties to replace in AEM page JSON.

AD.name: HTML Elements to parse
AD.description: List of the HTML elements to parse and their corresponding component type(in AEM). For example - <figure> element is mapped to image component in AEM. Applicable to CMSs storing content as HTML markup, ex - Wordpress

AD.name: HTML Elements and attributes mapping
AD.description: List of the HTML elements and attributes(comma separated) to read. For example - <figure=src,width.....>. Applicable to CMSs storing content as HTML markup, ex - Wordpress
